# Stefania's Story {#stefania}

Meet Stefania Chaplin, shown in figure \@ref(fig:stefania-fig). Stefania graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science with Business & Management in 2013. As of 2024, when this episode was recorded, she works as a solutions architect for [gitlab.com](https://about.gitlab.com) and [devstefops.com](https://devstefops.com). 

```{r stefania-fig, echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center", out.width = "100%", fig.cap = "(ref:captionstefania)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/linkedinstefania.jpg")
```
(ref:captionstefania) Stefania Chaplin [linkedin.com/in/stefania-chaplin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/stefania-chaplin/). Picture re-used from LinkedIn with permission, thanks Stefania.

## What's Your Story Stefania? {#stefania-story}

An edited podcast transcript will appear here in due course. In the meantime, an [un-edited, raw machine-generated transcript can be found here](https://github.com/dullhunk/cdyf/blob/master/raw-transcript-stefania.md) with highlights from *One Tune, One Book, One Podcast and One Film* shown below.
